item.title: Supabase Launch Week 15 Hackathon
item.description: Build an Open Source Project over 10 days. 5 prize categories.

item.title: Storage: 10x Larger Uploads, 3x Cheaper Cached Egress, and 2x Egress Quota
item.description: Upload files up to 500 GB with significant egress cost reductions.

item.title: Persistent Storage and 97% Faster Cold Starts for Edge Functions
item.description: Mount S3-compatible buckets as persistent file storage in Edge Functions with up to 97% faster cold start times.

item.title: Algolia Connector for Supabase
item.description: Bring lightning-fast search to your Supabase apps, with no code required.

item.title: New Observability Features in Supabase
item.description: New unified logging, advanced reports, and AI debugging capabilities.

item.title: Improved Security Controls and A New Home for Security
item.description: Access to a new central security page and launch of additional controls.

item.title: Introducing Branching 2.0
item.description: Create, review and merge Supabase branches all within the dashboard.

item.title: Stripe-To-Postgres Sync Engine as standalone Library
item.description: Sync Stripe webhook data directly to Postgres using standalone TypeScript library.

item.title: Supabase Analytics Buckets with Iceberg Support
item.description: Analytics buckets optimized for large-scale data analysis with Apache Iceberg support.
